pages.text: Welcome to SadderPack! This guide will teach you various things you might want to know for playing this pack.$(br2)The information contained in this guide is mostly kept short, so as to not keep you here for too long, so please pay attention.

SadderPack is a kitchen sink pack, meaning that there's a bunch of content for all kinds of players.$(br2)Please take a bit of your time to read the entries in the Introduction category. They'll get you up to speed with everything you need to know.
